N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 671.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
contains requirements and specifications relative to the provision of the home
and community-based services (HCBS) waiver community residential habilitation
services delivered in certified community residences as authorized by the

Secretary of the United States Department of Health and Human Services pursuant
to section 1915(c) of the Social Security Act (see glossary). (b) All providers of home and community-based
waiver services shall be authorized pursuant to a Medicaid provider agreement
issued and approved by the New York State Department of Social Services
specific to the type of services being offered. (c) In addition, all authorized HCBS waiver
community residential habilitation providers shall comply with the requirements
of Parts 624 and 633 of this Title. (d) In order to receive authorization from
OPWDD to provide community residential habilitation services, a provider shall: (1)
hold a valid operating certificate from
OPWDD as a supervised or supportive community residence; and
(2)
be issued a specific authorized provider
medical assistance reimbursement number. Notes
